CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use GPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Toggles apps use of GPS. Does not have any affect on device settings.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Network
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allows this app to toggle the use of the Network Provider.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto-start GPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allows app to automatically start GPS and Network Service if they are available.

EditTextPreference.android:title: GPS Min Update Time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum time (ms) for LocationService GPS to wait before updating.

EditTextPreference.android:title: GPS Min Update Distance
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum distance (meters) for LocationService GPS to wait before updating.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Network Min Update Time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum time (ms) for LocationService Network to wait before updating.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Network Min Update Distance
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum distance (meters) for LocationService Network to wait before updating.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Custom Criteria
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: App will use custom criteria to determine best Location provider.

ListPreference.android:title: Set Accuracy
ListPreference.android:summary: Sets the criteria preferences for accuracy.

ListPreference.android:title: Set Power
ListPreference.android:summary: Sets the criteria preferences for power consumption.

ListPreference.android:title: Set Cost
ListPreference.android:summary: Sets whether or not the app is allowed to incur monetary cost.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Red GPS Graphic Size
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Sets the size of the red graphic indicating a GPS point on the map (default = 10).

EditTextPreference.android:title: Blue Network Location Graphic Size
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Sets the size of the blue graphic indicating a network location point on map (default = 10).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Center using GPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Centers map using GPS values. Uncheck to center using Network Location coordinates.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Accumulate Locations on Map
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If unchecked only the most current GPS or Network location point will be drawn on the map.
